Hi,
i recently found this:
www.imagination-engines.com

do you think HyperN=
EAT can evolve it's own type of Creativity Machine? Creativity Machine lack=
s "save" method wich HyperNEAT does using genes. Maybe we could merge the t=

hat others think about this.
Thanks in advance.
